articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The 91-year-old billionaire doesn’t see crypto as a “productive asset,” adding that he wouldn’t buy all the Bitcoin in the world even for $25.
articles.title: Elon Musk Weighs in as Warren Buffet Wouldn't Pay $25 for Every Bitcoin

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The Wikimedia Foundation had previously accepted Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Bitcoin Cash through BitPay.
articles.title: After Eight Years, Wikipedia Stops Accepting Bitcoin and Ethereum Donations

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The craze caused Etherscan to crash and Ethereum gas fees to soar to thousands of dollars per transaction.
articles.title: Yuga Labs Sees $561 Million in Otherside Ethereum NFT Sales Within 24 Hours

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Also: Marc Andreessen criticized Warren Buffet for criticizing Bitcoin, and details emerged of a $16 crypto domain sold for over $400,000.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Elon Musk’s Takeover Bid, Bored Ape Yacht Club’s Metaverse Drop

articles.description: The muted response might suggest gamer backlash to NFTs is waning.
articles.title: Minecraft Developers’ Petition Against Gaming NFTs Gets Just 72 Signatures in a Week

articles.description: The crash calls to mind a 17-hour outage in September, which the Solana Foundation said was due to "in effect, a denial of service attack."

articles.description: Fun with ZK Proofs, Optimistic Rollups, Raaves and Waffles at Yet Another Crypto Conference(s).

articles.description: SBF has made FTX the hottest company in crypto, and showed off his clout at a huge event in The Bahamas. How long will the honeymoon phase last?

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Artist Joshua Skirtich sold nearly everything he owned to focus on creating art for the metaverse, starting with his Jenesis NFTs.

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: This isn't the first time Rari Capital has suffered an eight-figure exploit.
articles.title: Fei Protocol Offers $10M Bounty After $80M Rari Capital Exploit

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Elsewhere, Buenos Aires Mayor Horacio Rodriguez Larreta gave a presentation on optimizing city government with Web3 tech.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Prices Continue Downward, Central African Republic Adopts Bitcoin, Canada Says 'Nah'

articles.description: The Ethereum-based governance token used in the BAYC ecosystem has skyrocketed in value over the last seven days.
articles.title: Leading NFT Marketplace OpenSea Now Accepting ApeCoin

articles.description: Unlike other staking services, it gives a token in return called Staked ETH that can be plugged back into various DeFi protocols.
articles.title: Why Ethereum Mergers Love Lido

articles.description: Beeple sat for a wide-ranging conversation with Decrypt at the museum in Italy where his digital sculpture HUMAN ONE is going on display.

articles.description: The first opportunity to ape into the Bored Ape metaverse is coming on Saturday. Here’s the latest on the potentially huge NFT drop.

articles.description: Kevin Rose’s collection of 10,000 pixel owls has quickly become one of the most valuable NFT collections around.

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Coinbase will no longer publish a shortlist of assets it's considering listing, instead only publicizing new listings after a decision has been made.
articles.title: Coinbase Changes Listing Policy for New Tokens After Allegations of Front-Running

articles.description: This week, the Central African Republic became the second country to make Bitcoin legal tender.
articles.title: Central African Republic Didn't Share Bitcoin Adoption Plans With Central Bank: Report

articles.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs have hit a new record “floor” price ahead of this weekend’s big Otherside metaverse launch.

articles.description: Decentralized applications, or dapps, are a radical new way of building applications, using blockchain to do away with centralized middlemen.

articles.description: ERC-721 is a token standard for non-fungible tokens on Ethereum. A pillar of the ecosystem, it supports billions of dollars worth of NFTs.
articles.title: What is ERC-721? The Ethereum NFT Token Standard

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: A recent DDoS attack on a “crypto launchpad” attempted to flood the platform with 15.3 million requests per second, reported Cloudflare.
articles.title: Cloudflare Blocks Massive DDoS Attack on Crypto Platform

articles.description: During a recent event, Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson explained why American regulators are struggling to deal with crypto.
articles.title: Cardano Creator Hoskinson: US Regulators 'Not Prepared' to Handle Crypto

articles.description: Blockchain games, a category that's attracted $2.5 billion in VC funding, accounted for 78% of all transactions, says DappRadar.
articles.title: DeFi Transactions at 1-Year Low, NFTs Set All-Time High in Q1: Report

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: A crypto exchange executive and a captain of the South Korean army have been arrested for allegedly leaking military secrets to North Korea.

articles.description: The token powering the ApeDAO, ApeCoin, has seen a price spike over the past 24 hours as the community votes on several proposals.
articles.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club’s ApeCoin Soars as Community Mulls DAO Proposals

articles.description: The U.S. Labor Department had some choice words regarding Fidelity’s move to open up its retirement accounts to Bitcoin.
articles.title: US Department of Labor Shares ‘Grave Concerns’ on Fidelity’s Bitcoin Retirement Move

articles.description: After a year of silence, the Bitcoin Cash evangelist returned to Twitter to share his views on Dogecoin and Elon Musk.
articles.title: 'Bitcoin Jesus' Comes Back to Twitter, Says He Likes Dogecoin

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Coinbase NFT saw less than 900 transactions since its beta launch last week, but volume spiked Thursday.
articles.title: After Slow First Week, Coinbase NFT Marketplace Records $100K in Daily Sales

articles.description: The Ethereum Name Services has generated $1.3 million in sales over the last 24 hours, as .eth domain sales surge 2,300%.
articles.title: Domain Names Are Fueling the Latest NFT Craze on Ethereum—Here’s Why

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The Digital Commodity Exchange Act of 2022 builds off the Commodity Exchange Act to "fill gaps" in crypto regulation not fully addressed by either the CFTC nor the SEC.
articles.title: House Bill Aims to Give CFTC Authority to Regulate Crypto Exchanges, Stablecoins

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The stock and crypto trading service’s overall revenue dropped 18% last quarter, but its crypto business is headed in the other direction.
articles.title: Robinhood’s Crypto Revenue Rises in Q1 Despite Overall Downturn

articles.description: The Open Network is enabling users to send Toncoin via Telegram Chat.
articles.title: Telegram Users Can Now Send Crypto via the Messaging App

articles.description: The law will regulate the use of cryptocurrencies such as BTC in the Central American country, as well as provide a legal framework for DAOs and STOs.
articles.title: Panama Passes Law to Regulate Bitcoin, Legally Recognize DAOs

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: You can own part of Lewis Hamilton’s or George Russell’s F1 car with FTX’s NFTs for next weekend’s Miami Grand Prix.
articles.title: FTX’s Mercedes F1 Ethereum NFTs Come With a Piece of the Actual Car

articles.author: Matt Hussey,Daniel Phillips
articles.description: Smart contracts are at the heart of the blockchain revolution, providing the building blocks for decentralized applications (dapps).
articles.title: What Are Smart Contracts and How Do They Work?

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: American crypto enthusiasts will soon be able to pay their utilities, mortgage payments, and even taxes with Bitcoin.
articles.title: Bitrefill to Launch Service Letting US Users Pay Bills With Crypto

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: DeGods will obtain all of the top-tier Ethereum NFT ownership stakes in Killer 3s, one of the teams in Ice Cube’s 3-on-3 basketball league.
articles.title: DeGods Solana NFT Project to Buy Team Stake in Ice Cube’s BIG3 League

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The social mead company also revealed a 2019 error that led it to report inflated active user figures.
articles.title: Twitter Cancels Earnings Call, Citing Pending $44B Musk Deal

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: FTX officially launches its first ad campaign, "In On," which features CEO Sam Bankman-Fried and supermodel Gisele Bundchen.
articles.title: FTX Announces $1 Billion Charity Fund and First Print Ad Campaign Starring Gisele Bundchen

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin interviews Kevin Seo, co-founder of Bored & Hungry, the BAYC-inspired burger joint in Los Angeles. Video shot and edited by Decrypt's Jason Nelson.
articles.title: Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Restaurant in L.A.

articles.description: Ava Labs president John Wu talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the meteoric rise of so-called "Ethereum killer" Avalanche (he hates that phrase), its utility and usability, AVAX token, tribalism in crypto, the SEC and regulation, and NFT backlash.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 8: All About Avalanche with John Wu

articles.description: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.
articles.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'

articles.description: Retired NASA astronaut Scott Kelly talks to Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward about his new Ethereum NFT collection, which benefits relief efforts in Ukraine, plus the cryptocurrencies he holds and his excitement about the metaverse.
articles.title: Astronaut Scott Kelly Discusses NFT Project, Crypto Holdings, and the Metaverse

articles.description: Gemini COO Noah Perlman talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Gemini's approach to competing with other exchanges, its focus on regulatory compliance, and his own views on Bitcoin maximalists.
articles.title: Gemini COO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022

articles.description: Robinhood Crypto CTO Johann Kerbrat talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Robinhood's new Lightning Network integration, potential NFT plans, and Kerbrat's personal history with crypto, including mining Bitcoin back in 2010.
articles.title: Robinhood Crypto CTO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022

articles.description: Emily Yang aka pplpleasr never thought she'd be an online celebrity. But in 2021 an NFT version of a digital ad she did for Uniswap sold for $525,000 to a DAO of her fans, and now she's among the most famous NFT artists. She speaks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the rise of NFT art, the traditional art world taking it seriously, NFT haters, and which NFT marketplaces can beat OpenSea.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 7: pplpleasr and the NFT Art Revolution

articles.description: The legendary rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Ice Cube talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about why his BIG3 basketball league plans to offer fractional team ownership in the form of NFTs, plus his personal interest in crypto.
articles.title: Ice Cube: Crypto and NFTs Are ‘The Ultimate Fuck You to the Mainstream’
